La hermandad - en el principio fue el ruido (The brotherhood - in the beginning was noise) is a special album by the German punk band Die Toten Hosen for a release in Argentina. In addition to 9 original songs from In aller Stille and 6 remixes from ZurÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¼ck zum GlÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¼ck era there are also 3 new songs, of which 2 feature lyrics in both Spanish and German ("Vida desesperada" and "Viva la muerte") and one is purely in Spanish ("Uno, dos, ultraviolento"), a cover from Los Violadores, oldest Argentine punk band. The album will also be available in Germany.
